value.title: AWS launches HealthLake to help health care organizations query medical data

value.title: AI Tracks Lawmakers Using Their Phones on the Job so We Can Properly Mock Them
value.excerpt: Politicians are hereby busted for using their cell phones during sessions, thanks to software written by Belgium artist Dries Depoorter.
